text: Risto Heikki Ryti (; 3 February 1889 – 25 October 1956) was a Finnish politician. He was the fifth President of Finland from 1940 to 1944. He was also the 14th Prime Minister of Finland between 1939 until 1940. ==References== ==Other websites== * Finnish Literature Society, Biographical Centre: Ryti, Risto (1889–1956) covered by Martti Turtola * Helsingin Sanomat: A silent president has his say covered by Markku Jokisipilä Category:1889 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Presidents of Finland Category:Prime Ministers of Finland
title: Risto Ryti
